data.name: Max_Slides.Help
data.value: The maximum slides to be displayed in this gallery

data.name: PauseTime.Help
data.value: Turn on auto play to auto move to next slide every few seconds

data.name: ArrowButtons.Help
data.value: Whether to use arrow buttons for navigation purpose

data.name: Navigation.Help
data.value: Use either bullets or thumbnails for quick navigation

data.name: LiquidLayout.Help
data.value: Use it for a full-width liquid designs. If it's 'true' all positions will be recalculated on window re-size. If you have the fixed-width slider block then you should set parameter value to 'false' to avoid superfluous calculations.

data.name: Background.Help
data.value: You can upload a new image to /DesktopModules/UltraMediaGallery/Css/TripleLayerSlider/Background folder to have your own background

data.name: FirstLayer.Help
data.value: The first floating layer below actual images, you can upload a new image to /DesktopModules/UltraMediaGallery/Css/TripleLayerSlider/Layer folder to have your own layer

data.name: DownloadMore.Help
data.value: When downloaded, unzip it and copy all files to /DesktopModules/UltraMediaGallery/Css/TripleLayerSlider/Layer folder

data.name: FirstLayerDistance.Help
data.value: A integer number between 0~100, higher values represent faster move speed

data.name: FirstLayerDirection.Help
data.value: The move direction of this layer

data.name: SecondLayer.Help
data.value: The second floating layer below actual images, you can upload a new image to /DesktopModules/UltraMediaGallery/Css/TripleLayerSlider/Layer folder to have your own layer

data.name: SecondLayerDistance.Help
data.value: A integer number between 0~100, higher values represent faster move speed

data.name: SecondLayerDirection.Help
data.value: The move direction of this layer

data.name: CaptionPosition.Help
data.value:
In default, all captions are placed above the bottom area of actual images, you can change it by entering desired position(top, right, bottom, left) here.

Combination is accepted, if you enter "left right" in this textbox, the 1st caption will be placed on left side, the 2nd one will be on right side, the 3rd one will be on left again.
